title: Chinese mushroom chicken wings
ingredients: ['1kg whole chicken wings', '1 small bowl dry mushrooms', '5cm piece root ginger, or to taste', '4 spring onions, or to taste', 'oil for frying', '1 tablespoon rice wine', '2 tablespoons oyster sauce', '2 dashes dark soy sauce', '2 dashes light soy sauce', '1 teaspoon sugar', 'black pepper to taste']
